group_1.textLeft: Just walking's making me feel like@I'm gonna melt…
You guys are Exorcist Maidens, right?@Can't you do something?

group_1.textRight: No can do…

group_1.textLeft: Hang in there.@We ain't far from Yamatai.

group_1.textRight: That's right…

group_1.textLeft: …Still, I had no idea you guys were here to see@Queen Himiko too.
Well, you guys ARE Exorcist Maidens from The@Future, so I guess you'd be interested in her…

group_1.textRight: …You think it's okay for us to lie to her like this?

group_1.textLeft: This power that can best us so effortlessly…@It seems those wild rumors were true after all.
Yamatai has granted the power of curses@to their shrine maidens…
…Doesn't matter.@We just gotta do this until we're sure.

group_1.textRight: Really…?

group_1.textLeft: *Pant…* *Pant…*@W-wait up…guys…
Did I walk too far…?@My legs just won't listen anymore.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah?@Why don't we take a short rest, then?
Lemme guess, you wanna go swimming, right?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:105201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah?!

group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Toyo?@Don't you want to swim?
Oh, I get it. You wanna play around@in the water, don't you?

group_1.textLeft: N-no! That's not true!@Quit treating me like a little kid!

group_1.textRight: Aw, here we go again.

group_1.textLeft: I'm not, I'm not, I'M NOT!@Not at all!
We gotta get to Yamatai so I can meet@Queen Himiko right away.
We don't have time for games!
[chara:105201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Here Rena! Ker-SPLASH!

group_1.textRight: Ah!@Hey, you!

group_1.textLeft: Eek! Kyah! Cut that out!
[chara:105201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]NO, WE CAAAAAAAAN'T!

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?@You looked like you were having fun.

group_1.textLeft: Quiet!@We don't have time for games!

group_1.textRight: But you were having a ball just now…
…I mean, so were we.

group_1.textLeft: Well, ain't nothin' more to it but@to follow Toyo.
I think our number one priority's gotta@be gaining her trust.
Yeah, if we get booted out while we're@on the road, we're pretty screwed.
Yep! There might be more of those Kuna guys@hiding out.
We don't have TIME for games!

group_1.textRight: We know, you just said that…
Sounds like you might be hangry.
Right, it's a little early, but what do you say@we rustle up some dinner?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, speaking of which…@We still have those bamboo shoots to eat.

group_1.textRight: Bamboo shoots, huh…? Doesn't look like we got@enough for the four of us, though.

group_1.textLeft: …I can find us more bamboo shoots around@here in no time!

group_1.textRight: Awesome! It's all you, then.

group_1.textLeft: We can't just munch on bamboo shoots, though.@Let's catch some fish, Kaede.

group_1.textRight: Oh boy… I don't know if we can manage@that without tools…

group_1.textLeft: N-no, wait, we gotta be on the move right now.
We don't have time to sit around and eat!
[chara:105201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Mmm! So yummy!

group_1.textRight: Glad you like it!

group_1.textLeft: That was so so AMAZING!@How'd you make it?

group_1.textRight: How…? Oh, just the usual, you know, boiling it@to get rid of the bitterness…
Those people from Kuna ended up dropping@a bamboo tool in their retreat…
I wasn't sure if it would work, but it turned out@we could use it as a pot!

group_1.textLeft: Well, it was a little small, but it worked.
If you didn't do anything special,@then why does it taste so good?

group_1.textRight: I think it's because food tastes better@when you eat it with friends.

group_1.textLeft: Is that really how it works…?

group_1.textRight: I mean, bamboo shoots are also pretty tasty@on their own.
Seriously, how'd you find these things@when they're not even in season?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* I'm good for something at least…

group_1.textRight: …Yes, you can't trust those bamboo shoots…
Bamboo shoots don't grow at this time of year.
Did the curse's power bring them about?

group_1.textLeft: …Ah…

group_1.textRight: What's with the look?

group_1.textLeft: …I-it's nothing.

group_1.textRight: Well, anyway, I really do appreciate your talent@for finding bamboo shoots.
You're great at it, you know?

group_1.textLeft: Eh…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I've never eaten such yummy bamboo@shoots!

group_1.textLeft: …You guys…aren't scared of me?

group_1.textRight: Ah…you mean the curse and all that?@I don't really care about that stuff.
That's right… I don't think you're cursed@to begin with.

group_1.textLeft: You…

group_1.textRight: So c'mon. You gotta quit saying dumb stuff@like that.
Just buck up and be honest…@You can say you're happy.

group_1.textLeft: Ah… Agh… Nngh… Gggh…!
GUHWAAAAAAAN! GUHWAAAN GUHWAAAN GUHWAAAN!

group_1.textRight: …Sh-she's bawling…!

group_1.textLeft: I can't heeeeelp iiiiit…@I'm sho happyyyyyy…
I'm sho happy…
[chara:105201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...NO! We don't have time to sit around@and eat!

group_1.textRight: Not again…
